feed.title: Kawartha Lakes (Fenelon Falls) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Kawartha Lakes (Fenelon Falls)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:23 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -9.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Peterborough Municipal Airport 6:47 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: -9.9°C
Pressure: 99.7 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 73 %
Wind Chill: -19
Dewpoint: -13.9°C
Wind: SW 30 km/h gust 45 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 7.
entry.summary: Flurries with risk of snow squalls. Blowing snow this evening. Local blowing snow overnight. Local amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 70 becoming west 30 gusting to 50 after midnight. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 6.
entry.summary: Flurries with risk of snow squalls. Local blowing snow. Local amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light early in the morning. Wind becoming west 30 in the morning. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 9. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries late in the evening and overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 9. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
